Class UserSession

java.lang.Object
com.example.bobapos.controllers.UserSession
public class UserSession extends Object
Manages user session information for the Boba POS system using the Singleton pattern. This class maintains the state of the currently logged-in user, including their credentials, role, and permissions. It ensures that only one user session exists at any given time throughout the application lifecycle.
Since:
2025-10-26
Version:
1.0
Author:
Team Y4
